description: This file defines a mock class 'CommunicatorClientMock' that implements the 'ICommunicatorClient' interface, used for testing purposes in the application. It uses Google Mock to create mock methods for various communication-related operations such as Open, Acquire, Offer, Revoke, and Close.
external_methods: MOCK_METHOD(INTERFACE*, Open, (const std::string& className, const uint32_t version, const uint32_t waitTime), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(INTERFACE*, Acquire, (const uint32_t waitTime, const std::string& className, const uint32_t versionId), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, Offer, (INTERFACE* offer, const uint32_t version, const uint32_t waitTime), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(uint32_t, Revoke, (INTERFACE* offer, const uint32_t version, const uint32_t waitTime), (override))

classes.name: CommunicatorClientMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the ICommunicatorClient interface for unit testing, providing mocked methods to simulate communication behaviors.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments the reference count; marked as const indicating it does not modify object state.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements the reference count, possibly deleting the object when count reaches zero; marked as const.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a communication channel with specified wait time.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Overloaded version returning a pointer to INTERFACE, with parameters className, version, and waitTime.

methods.name: Acquire
methods.description: Overloaded acquire method returning a pointer to INTERFACE, with parameters waitTime, className, and versionId.

methods.name: Offer
methods.description: Offers an INTERFACE pointer for a specific version and wait time.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes an offered INTERFACE pointer for a specific version and wait time.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes the communication channel with specified wait time.
